title: YouTube Connect Integration Guide
description: This is a sample demonstration of how YouTube connect would work in the Cupido app

sections.heading: YouTube Integration Overview
sections.content: By connecting your YouTube account, Cupido can analyze your viewing patterns, subscribed channels, and engagement to better understand your interests and personality traits.

sections.heading: What We Analyze
sections.content:
• Video categories you watch most
• Channels you're subscribed to
• Comment patterns and engagement style
• Time spent on different content types
• Liked videos and playlists

sections.heading: Personality Insights Generated
sections.content:
Based on your YouTube activity, we can infer:

• Learning preferences (visual, auditory, hands-on)
• Entertainment tastes and humor style
• Interest in current events vs. evergreen content
• Social vs. solo content consumption patterns
• Depth vs. breadth of interests

sections.heading: Privacy & Data Usage
sections.content: Your YouTube data is processed securely and used only to enhance your Cupido profile. We never share your viewing history with other users - only the personality insights derived from it.

sections.heading: How It Enhances Matching
sections.content:
YouTube integration helps us understand:

• Shared interests with potential matches
• Compatible learning and communication styles
• Similar values based on content preferences
• Lifestyle compatibility indicators

sections.heading: Getting Started
sections.content:
1. Tap 'Connect YouTube' in your profile
2. Authorize Cupido to access your YouTube data
3. We'll analyze your recent activity (last 6 months)
4. New personality insights will appear in 24-48 hours
5. Your matching algorithm will be updated automatically

sample_insights.description: Prefers tutorial videos and visual explanations over text-based content
Watches long-form content and full series rather than short clips
Actively comments and engages with creators and other viewers
